
### multiple processes?  {.smaller}


```
while (...) {
    pid = fork();
    if (pid == 0) {
        exec ...
    } else if (pid > 0) {
        pids.push_back(pid);
    }
}

/* retrieve exit statuses as processes finish */
while ((pid = waitpid(-1, ...)) != -1) {
    handleProcessFinishing(pid);
}
```
